items.name: Rohan Kumar
items.text: Best momos in Sherghati! The Kurkure Momos are absolutely amazing. Crispy outside, juicy inside. I visit at least twice a week. Highly recommended!

items.name: Priya Singh
items.text: Traveled from Gaya just to try these momos after hearing so much about them. Worth every kilometer! The Pizza Momos are unique and delicious.
